name: road construction, company, internal | road, company, internal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9497/documentation

All data is referred to meter2*year. Construction data is based on material expenditures for Swiss 2nd class roads.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Inventory for construction and operation of the traffic area (roads and parking) on company sites.  The inventory includes processes for the supply of used materials such as gravel and bitumen . NMVOC emissions from bitumen are included. Transport of materials to the constructions site has been taken into account. Also, de-icing with sodium chlorid is accounted for. Energy cosumption due to lighting is excluded as well as weed control and marking.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/421:Construction of roads and railways/4210:Construction of roads and railways

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data refers to average conditions in Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Swiss state of the art technology
